
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot)
target_include_directories(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage
)
target_link_libraries(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-cpuid_check
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-lib
)
target_link_options(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -framework
  CoreFoundation
)
target_sources(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/blob_depot.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/blob_depot_test_functions.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/ydb/core/blobstorage/ut_blobstorage/blob_depot_event_managers.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot
  TEST_TARGET
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
target_allocator(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(blobstorage-ut_blobstorage-ut_blob_depot)
